ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The main aim of Darpan seva Samiti is to promote the work in the field of education, health,environment and social welfare programues from time to time the society is oraganising free training in the obove mentioned fields. The society is giving training to the youth in computer hardware assistant, mason, accounting and banking sales representatives under the scheme of mukhyamantri kaushal vikash yojna (MMKVY). The society is the training partner of Chhatisgarh state skill development authority ( CSSDA) whose registration no is CG0801P040. The society has given training to about 400 youth since 2015 and 205 youth the have been linked to employment and self employment. the society has a well equipped building and various tools and equipment. it has well qualified trainers to give training various programes were conducted on womens day. The Training is givin according to mes course.Along with this Course spoken english and personality development course is also conducted.
